venue.name: Rabb Auditorium at Boston Public Library in Copley Square

item.description:
A Greater Boston Group General Membership Meeting

Frederick Laskey, Executive Director, Massachusetts Water Resources Authority discusses where the tap water for Greater Boston comes from (The Quabbin Reservoir) and how the MWRA protects and ensures the quality of the water we enjoy every day. See how tap water compares with bottle water on the supermarket shelf. Free event.

Contact Mary Ann Nelson, 617-442-0123, NelsonMASierra@aol.com.
item.how_to_find_us: The organizer, Mary Ann, will have a nametag

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Tap Water - Better than Bottled?
